subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Apoel Nicosia became the first club from Cyprus to move on to the quarterfinals of the Champions League, while Lionel Messi scored five goals against Leverkusen.
snippet: Apoel Nicosia became the first club from Cyprus to move on to the quarterfinals of the Champions League, while Lionel Messi scored five goals against Leverkusen.
